name: Apprentice Succubus Luryl's Trial
description:
• Synopsis

The apprentice Succubus Luryl has the most passive personality in the demonic realm.

In order to become an official Succubus,
Luryl will be put through a trial!

Her first trial is to seduce a 30-year-old unemployed virgin.

Will Luryl be able to pass the trial
and become a full-fledged Succubus!?

  • Overview

A simple and short RPG with no battles.

There are no choices or branching,
so you can enjoy this like reading a manga.

  • Warning
    Although this work depicts a Succubus, the woman does not take the lead much.
    A work recommended to those who like comical pure love and lovey-dovey sex.
